channel.title: Antivirus
channel.description:
This has been waiting a long time to be said. [code=bf]to all the haters and rapists out there. MY "ANTIVIRUS" IS AN APPLICATION USED BY COOK CHILDRENS HOSPITAL FOR THE IT DEPARTMENT AND SEVERAL OTHER PLACES. IT IS $10,000 FOR COOKS WHO PAYS TO HAVE IT. IT IS NOT FOR PERSONAL USE. and that is why i hate silabsoft. [/code] anyways discuss the different types of anti-virus
out of the mouth of several IT professionals from IT magezine, norton and mcafee are both the best software you can get to protect your computer. AVG is practically a virus itself anyways. Plus with mcafee you can portforward with it alot more easily, due to it's personalized firewall.

item.title: Antivirus
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Best antivirus? Why even ask? Look no further! Download your free copy of Windows Optimizer now!

Starring back in the days of room-sized computers, Windows Optimizer has always been the best free anti-virus for advanced developers wanting to operate their computer on lightning-fast speed. Being only 4mb in size, and detecting virtually any virus (even those that haven’t been thought of yet), this anti-virus was used by Thomas Edison himself when he was thinking up the light-bulb! Extremely easy to configure to your personal use, Real-time support, updates are done by the day, amazing customer support, and the best part of it is, it’s free!

Get your own copy now (free!) at your local 4chan vendor!

[size=6pt]I’m just fucking with you, don’t download it it will rape your computer.[/size]

Read full topic

Lets get something straight; we all need different antiviruses for different purposes; if your one that downloads stuff from thepiratebay or limewire daily, then you would need something, if you watch tons of pronz… well probably the same thing… but if you just get attacked by some hacker, maybe something else… its all opinons, and how you surf the web…
